definition: north and south sides of the Yangtze River (idiom)/(fig.) all over China
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui

sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the United States after the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 美国的奴隶制度自南北战争后就废除了。

sentences.english: The slavery was overthrown after the Civil War in U.S.A.
sentences.chinese: 在南北战争结束之后，美国的奴隶制被废除了。

sentences.english: Staggering tasks confronted the people of the United States , North and South , when the Civil War ended.
sentences.chinese: 内战结束后，美国南北方的人民都面临着艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: Does north and south Han scramble for making space trash , the nobody tube?
sentences.chinese: 南北韩争相制造太空垃圾，没人管管？

sentences.english: North and south, directly go to photography floor to find m blue, just small stone.
sentences.chinese: 南北直接去摄影楼找米蓝了，刚好碰到小石头。

sentences.english: The so-called security zone is in the buffer zone between South and North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的联安全地带，也就是在南北韩之间的缓冲地带。

sentences.english: In the American Civil War the Confederate state took the offensive.
sentences.chinese: 美国南北战争中，南军采取攻势。

sentences.english: They have made many trips traveling both north and south on the eastern intercoastal waterway.
sentences.chinese: 他们在东海岸内陆航道上有过反复多次的南北航行。

sentences.english: Shanghai culture is the outcome of melting the cultures of north, south, east and west.
sentences.chinese: 海派文化是南北东西文化交融的结晶。

sentences.english: In the northern and southern dynasties, appear miscellaneous cast.
Enhance dialogue and improve North-South relations.
sentences.chinese: 促进对话，努力改善南北关系。

sentences.english: Fourth, to promote North-South dialogue and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 第四，推进南北对话与合作。

sentences.english: The central gallery that runs through the square from north to the south has fountain waterscape.
sentences.chinese: 贯穿广场南北的中央长廊，建有喷泉水景大道。

sentences.english: The forth chapter discusses the development and transformation of the imitating ancient poetry in Wei, Jin and Northern & Southern dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第四章论述魏晋南北朝拟“古诗”的发展流变。

sentences.english: No. 63 runs only north and south.
sentences.chinese: 我们63路车是南北行驶的。

sentences.english: The new main north-south road in Belize was cut through the forest only four or five miles away.
sentences.chinese: 一条纵贯伯利兹南北的路就在四五英里外横穿森林。

definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
lit. warp string in weaving/fig. vertical or north-south lines/to pass through/to cross lengthwise/to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
